meta.name: description
meta.content: The South Newton School Corporation Website provides the student body, parents, businesses, and community of Kentland, Goodland, Brook, Raub, and Earl Park Indiana a resource of information about their Elementary, Middle, and High School.

li.a: TENTATIVE AGREEMENT BETWEEN SOUTH NEWTON SCHOOL CORPORATION AND SOUTH NEWTON CLASSROOM TEACHERS ASSOCIATION.

div.style: background: rgb(238, 238, 238); padding: 5px 10px; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); border-image: none; text-align: center;
background: rgb(238, 238, 238); padding: 5px 10px; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); border-image: none; text-align: center;

span.a: Click here for important information regarding Graduation Cap and Gown

p.a: Click here for updated information from South Newton relating to the coronavirus.

p.span: South Newton Athletics has teamed up with Family ID to make your registration of your athlete an easier more streamlined experience. Please go to the following website to register your athlete for the spring sport they have decided to play. Thanks for your cooperation and GO REBELS!
